alert.note: Alert for Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:33AM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /11 AM MST/ SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills 30 to 40 below zero through Friday morning, then 20 to 35 below zero through Saturday morning. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph creating blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Nebraska into the southern panhandle. * WHEN...Wind Chill Warning, until noon CST /11 AM MST/ Saturday. Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lowest wind chills will be at night with only minor improvement during the daytime.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Chase; Deuel; Frontier; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins
